channel.title: Posts on Tautvydas Misiunas
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tautvydas Misiunas

item.title: First post
item.description: Hello and welcome! I set up this website to share my thoughts. It’s empty for now but I’ll be sure to start uploading content soon. I’m using Hugo and GitHub Pages which helps spin up static websites a lot. I’m hoping that Hugo will also have nice support for hosting static javascript/python code which would allow me to add visualisations. Thanks for visiting.

item.title: This is a Standard Post
item.description: This is what an ordinary post looks like, and you’re reading a custom excerpt right now. Have fun looking around the theme, and don’t forget to check it out on your phone!
